description.@en: You chant over a crowd of people, making them calm as sheep. Some even fall asleep, so enchanting are your words.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, a number of foes equal to your [FB] who can see and hear you suffer a -30 Base Chance to Resolve Tests. In addition, those who fail to immediately Resist with a Resolve Test are left Helpless for the spell’s Duration.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the affected automatically fail to Resist.

criticalFailure.@en: As you invoke the walk of sleep among the throng, they grow incensed. Suddenly, you find yourself in a situation that begins to spiral out of control! You are left Helpless for the spell’s Duration against those who you intended to use this Magick against.

reagents.@en: A handful of powdered gold, poured onto the ground (expended)
